p: This study was performed by subcutaneous injection of 20 µL of formalin solution (2.5% v/v) into the right hind paws of all mice ( Ahmad et al., 2010). During this test, the mice were divided into 4 groups consisting 6 mice in each group. Group I and II received tween-80 (10 mL/kg; b.w, p.o), and acetylsalicylic acid (10 mg/kg; b.w, i.p.) and were treated as negative and positive controls respectively, whereas the group III and IV received MEMP 200 and 400 (mg/kg; b.w, p.o) respectively. Licking was observed during initial 5 min and subsequent 15–30 min.
